name: Lisa
review: Very good food.

name: John
review: Really good food. Well cooked, balanced, tasty. Would order again.

name: T
review: Owner seems nice. Food is pretty good. Good portion too.

name: Diane
review: Quick, tasty, accurate!

name: Mark
review: Restaurant consistently has tasty food with our correct order.

name: Kareem
review: The best Mediterranean food

name: Mahashraya
review: Delightful food and great service

name: Daniel
review: Excellent! One of the best Middle Eastern restaurants!

name: Aidan
review: Love this place, their wraps are the best in Boston. Highly recommend the lule kebab wrap with hummus and garlic sauce. Very quick service too

name: Callie
review: Wraps from Noor are always exceptional! Amazing sauces and meats. I love them every time.

name: steve
review: Noor is the best

name: Penny
review: Consistently high quality, fresh delicious and exceptional friendly service

name: Sue
review: Food was very good

name: Tori
review: So deliciousâ€”11/10 would recommend!!!

name: Kait
review: Delicious! Best Mediterranean in the area.

name: Palkin
review: Fantastic salad. The shawarma can use more seasoning

name: Ethan
review: Healthy tasting food without much flavor-related character.

name: Rochelle
review: We love this restaurant

name: Jennifer
review: Both times, Noor Med Grill has provided EXCELLENT, fresh-tasting, wonderful food - and including special requests. FANTASTIC. About to order again ...

name: Luke
review: I was shocked by how much food you get for your money (in the good way). Tasty too.

name: Ellie
review: Noor is great! This is my quick go-to. Their Armenian rice is worth trying too, I love that it isn't too sweet, just the right combination of flavors.

name: Julie
review: Love Noor, it's super fresh and a good mix of veggies and protein. The order forms were clear and orders were correct. All so good. Our driver was quick and delivered contactless as requested.

name: Dave
review: Excellent food. Generous portions.

name: Judy
review: Love it. Repeat customer

name: Fred
review: My Mediterranean go-to

name: Jonathan
review: Very good food. Prompt delivery.

name: rebecca
review: Oh my goodness, I was floored by this food! It tasted fresh, Chicken was juicy and seasoned well. They gave me my moneys worth when it came to how much was given in the meal. The salad had these crispy wafer like croutons in it that added the perfect amount of crunch and texture. MMM I will definitely order from here again if the quality stays the same as. GOOD STUFF and Im a picky eater and quick to ask for a refund.

name: Amit
review: Great food, reasonable prices, and friendly service. Will certainly go back. Highly recommend.

name: Patricia
review: We had a luncheon at work and they ordered food from Noor. I was impressed with the quality and taste. Best Lebanese food I have had here in Mass. Will definitely try it again.

name: Dillon
review: Some of the best shawarma and other Middle Eastern dishes that I've had on this side of the Atlantic. My orders are always correct and speedy. I absolutely recommend!

name: Conrad
review: Very good wraps at cheap prices and fast service always. Easily the best "fast food" I've had in Boston.

name: Kib
review: Great food and service. Everything is delicious! Great hidden gem. Everything is worth trying, too!

name: Guy
review: Very prompt delivery! The falafels were light and delicious! Could not believe how much neat we had with out lamb Shawarma!! And the pickles really set the perfect tone.

name: Ismiley
review: Top tier shawarmas. No matter what you order, this restaurant will make sure to take good care of you.

name: Nate
review: Great place! I like their kebab & shawarma plates (you get a lot of food!), as well as their wraps. The baba ghanoush is really tasty. Very friendly and quick service. Definitely recommend!
